text: (upbeat electronic music)
- My name is Michael Zhang.

I'm a Software Development
Engineer, AWS Cloud Trail.

I actually came in as an
intern the year before.
It was a really good experience
'cause it was a good place to learn.
There's a lot of good mentoring
and the tools that we get to work with
are really large scale and well-developed.
Everyone has high standards.
Like, we push for the best practices,

make sure we check all the
boxes when we're doing things.
So that was a little bit of a surprise
when you actually start working.

You kind of think like,
you know, they're Amazon,
they're this big company.
Of course, they have like high standards
and everything like that.
But once you actually start working there,
it's a good surprise.
Everything feels really fast.
We have a lot of like tooling

to help with assisting
on the highest standards,
so you can make sure
that your code deployments are safe,
but at the same time,
you can make them quickly and frequently.
There's a lot of experience here
that'll help you grow, and learn,

and be the best software
engineer that you can.
(upbeat electronic music)
